## Welcome {.unnumbered}

This is the website for the master's thesis **"COVID-19: Outbreak prediction combining meteorological, mobility and demographic data"** for UOC's master in Data Science.

This book contains the development of the third working package (PEC3) with delivery date 15-may-2022. It is exposed the acquisition, cleaning and exploration process of the starting data. It also includes the development of the predictive models used for outbreak prediction and the results obtained.


::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"}
This book is written with the [Quarto](https://quarto.org) publishing system and published at <https://jperezord.github.io/> using Github pages.
:::
